response: We offer full refunds within 30 days of purchase with no questions asked. After 30 days, refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis depending on usage. To request a refund, go to your account settings and click 'Request Refund' or contact our support team at support@example.com.

retrievedDocs.content: Our refund policy allows full refunds within 30 days of purchase. No questions asked. Contact support for requests.
Account settings can be accessed from the main menu. Look for 'Billing' to manage subscriptions and refunds.
